name: Odd War
description:
An Arcade Styled Moba. Multiplayer Only. Made using Unity 5 and PUN. Made in the vein of a twin stick shooter (using WASD + mouse). The Moba tower defense style is standard lane based with the exception of aligned respawned towers (I though I might try something different). I am a one man indie please support me, spread the word, thank you!

WEBGL: http://www.aumstudio.co.za/OddWar_v1/
